newsArray.title: Bumrah, Siraj, Akash Deep: how well-stocked is Indian Test cricket’s pace cupboard?
creator: Vivek Krishnan
newsArray.description: A penetrative fast-bowling attack is a must for success in the classical format, but there is a slight drop-off in quality after Bumrah and Siraj. There were encouraging signs at Edgbaston and Lord’s, with Akash Deep pulling his weight and Nitish Kumar chipping in. However, the uncertainty around Shami’s fitness and the seeming lack of convincing depth need addressing
